Lash: - Updated Lash {AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20} Death Slam sound effects
- Ground Strike {AbilityIcon|Ability=Stomp|Size=20} Stomp Damage reduced from 125 to 110
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20} Death Slam cooldown increased from 110s to 130s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Grapple|Size=20} Grapple Bullet Damage bonus increased from +4 to +6
Warden: - Warden's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Last Stand|Size=20} Last Stand has improved visual effects
- New voice for {AbilityIcon|Ability=Warden|Size=20} Warden (in advance of upcoming model swap)
- Fixed a bug where {AbilityIcon|Ability=Warden|Size=20} Warden's second and third abilities were swapped VO wise
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Last Stand|Size=20} Last Stand no longer goes on cooldown when it is interrupted during its initial cast delay
Vindicta: - Vindicta's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20} Crow Familiar projectile effect indicates the radius more accurately now
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Vindicta|Size=20} Vindicta being able to shoot above the base wall
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20} Flight spirit bullet damage now has range effectiveness (previously the magic bullets did max damage from any range)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20} Flight spirit damage per bullet increased from 8 to 12
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20} Flight T2 bonus spirit damage per bullet increased from 8 to 12
Mo & Krill: - Moved a truck away from the garage to give wide enough path for {AbilityIcon|Ability=Mo & Krill|Size=20} Mo & Krill
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Combo|Size=20} Combo now uses a new instant cast mechanism. When you are in range there is a valid target indicator.
McGinnis: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Return Fire|Size=20} Return Fire: Fixed not returning fire to McGinnis' sentries
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Mini Turret|Size=20} Mini Turret T1 is now +1 Charge and +25% Movement Slow
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Mini Turret|Size=20} Mini Turret T2 is now +10m Attack Range and +10% Fire Rate
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Spectral Wall|Size=20} Spectral Wall cooldown reduced from 40s to 35s
Bebop: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb T3 now applies the silence on cast instead of detonation
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb T3 silence duration reduced from 5s to 3.5s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb now uses a new instant cast mechanism. When you are in range there is a valid target indicator.
Kelvin: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Frozen Shelter|Size=20} Frozen Shelter T1 increased from +35% to +40% Fire Rate Slow
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20} Ice Path T3 Now gains 1 Spirit per meter of {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20} Ice Path trail created. Max of 40 Spirit.
Grey Talon: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Charged Shot|Size=20} Charged Shot cooldown reduced from 18s to 16s
Haze: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20} Sleep Dagger cooldown increased from 25s to 27s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20} Smoke Bomb cooldown reduced from 45s to 35s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20} Smoke Bomb T1 changed to +4 Invis Sprint
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20} Smoke Bomb T2 is now -20s Cooldown
Infernus: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Afterburn|Size=20} Afterburn T2 now reduces enemy Spirit damage by 30%
Ivy: - True Form cooldown reduced from 50s to 40s
Lady Geist: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Exchange|Size=20} Soul Exchange now uses a new instant cast mechanism. When you are in range there is a valid target indicator.
Paradox: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20} Kinetic Carbine T3 reduced from +75% to +50%
Yamato: - Shadow Explosion cooldown reduced from 120s to 90s

Cold Front: - Updated {AbilityIcon|Ability=Cold Front|Size=20} Cold Front sound effects
Fire Rate: - Added a new T3 Spirit Item, Shifting Shroud. Innate: +10% {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate. Active: You become invulnerable for 2.5s, during which you cannot move or perform any actions. When your invulnerability expires, your gun is instantly reloaded and you gain 14 bonus Spirit for 6s. Cooldown: 70s.
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Mystic Slow|Size=20} Mystic Slow: Fire Rate slow increased from 20% to 35%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Frozen Shelter|Size=20} Frozen Shelter T1 increased from +35% to +40% Fire Rate Slow
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Mini Turret|Size=20} Mini Turret T2 is now +10m Attack Range and +10% Fire Rate
Kinetic Dash: - Now causes your dash-jumps to only require 1 stamina
Berserker: - Weapon Damage Per Stack increased from 5% to 6%
Reactive Barrier: - Now provides a Spirit Shield instead of a Bullet Shield
Return Fire: - Now also reflects 30% of Spirit damage (requires line of sight)
- Bullet damage returned reduced from 75% to 60%
- Fixed not returning fire to {AbilityIcon|Ability=McGinnis|Size=20} McGinnis' sentries
Silence Glyph: - Now applies 8% Spirit Amp instead of -15% Bullet Resist
Decay: - Now does 2.2% Max HP DPS instead of flat DPS
Majestic Leap: - You can now use the active again while in the air to dive down faster
Improved Burst: - Max HP bonus damage reduced from 13% to 11%
Mystic Slow: - Now requires {AbilityIcon|Ability=Suppressor|Size=20} Suppressor as a component
- Now provides +75 Health, +3 Regen and +6 spirit
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate slow increased from 20% to 35%
Suppressor: - Now requires {AbilityIcon|Ability=Suppressor|Size=20} Suppressor as a component
Withering Whip: - Now applies -25% Bullet Resist instead of 25% Spirit Amp
Diviner's Kevlar: - Now triggers off of casting ultimates. Grants 700 bullet shield and 40 spirit for 10 seconds.
Echo Shard: - No longer gives +20 Spirit for the second cast
Mystic Reverb: - Extra damage on the reverb reduced from 40% to 35%
Smoke: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20} Smoke Bomb cooldown reduced from 45s to 35s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20} Smoke Bomb T1 changed to +4 Invis Sprint
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20} Smoke Bomb T2 is now -20s Cooldown

Crow Familiar: - Vindicta's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20} Crow Familiar projectile effect indicates the radius more accurately now
Time Wall: - Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Time Wall|Size=20} Time Wall damaging units that don't move multiple times instead of once per walk through

Ice Path: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20} Ice Path T3 Now gains 1 Spirit per meter of {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20} Ice Path trail created. Max of 40 Spirit.
Charged Shot: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Charged Shot|Size=20} Charged Shot cooldown reduced from 18s to 16s

Spectral Wall: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Spectral Wall|Size=20} Spectral Wall cooldown reduced from 40s to 35s
Combo: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Combo|Size=20} Combo now uses a new instant cast mechanism. When you are in range there is a valid target indicator.
Kinetic Carbine: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20} Kinetic Carbine T3 reduced from +75% to +50%
Flight: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20} Flight spirit bullet damage now has range effectiveness (previously the magic bullets did max damage from any range)

General: - Playtesting times are now starting 1 hour earlier. Weekdays are 6PM PDT and weekends are 4PM PDT.
- Redesigned the Walker model and visuals
- Added ambient sound effects
- Added jar smash sound effects
- Improved NPC/minion weapon fire audio feedback for victims
- Improved player damage received audio feedback
- Fixed a bug where the shopping book visuals could get stuck on your hero
- Patrons will now play a voice warning when Rejuvenator time is close to expiring as well as when it's expired
- Updated VO for Amber Hand's Patron
- Increased the duration of the item-used popup text a bit
- Added a short wall between Shrines level of the base and the Weakened Patron level
- Moved the taxi back into the street to fix players getting stuck between the front and the building corner
- Added clips to both sides of the overpass on outer lanes to keep from hitting your head on the ledge when climbing
- Added clips at outer lane T1 stairs where you could get stuck doing a roll slide
- Fixed gaps where you could climb outside of the map
- Added a wall between the T1 shop and the hallway on the outer lanes by the Fire House and the Chapel to prevent attackers from shooting the T1 without taking damage
- Fixed a couple of spots where Mo could get stuck between a truck and wall
- Replaced news stand that was close to the T1 with different cover kiosk building to avoid shop confusion
- Fixed no collision on water tower on the garage roof.
- Medium and Hard neutrals now spawn at 7 minutes
- Neutrals now have 20% Spirit Resist
- Basement neutrals now have +2 Medium neutrals and -4 Small neutrals
- Basement neutrals are now classified as a Medium camp instead of a Small camp (for the purposes of spawn time)
- Fixed various abuses where you can shoot neutrals without them being able to shoot back. Neutrals now become invulnerable when they have no line of sight of you for 2 seconds.
- Spirit scaling reduced by ~19% (the total effective Spirit damage is reduced by less than this, this is just the Spirit multiplier scaling portion and has largest impact on late game burst)
- Respawn curve adjusted slightly (results in a few seconds of increased respawn time in the mid phase, same overall max respawn time)
- Zipline Boost ability is now available at the start of the game (used to start on cooldown)
- Shield break cooldown reduced from 80s to 60s
- Troopers run speed increased from 10 m/s to 11 m/s
- Medic Trooper health increased from 200 to 240
- Medic Bullets: Cooldown reduced from 5s to 4s
